mapper.select: SELECT post_id, title, abstract, content, fb_date, imgurl, author, category_id FROM posts
SELECT post_id, title, abstract, content, fb_date, imgurl, author, category_id FROM posts WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, abstract, content, fb_date, imgurl, author, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{abstractText}, #{content}, #{fbDate}, #{imgUrl}, #{author}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, abstract = #{abstractText}, content = #{content}, fb_date = #{fbDate}, imgurl = #{imgUrl}, author = #{author}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE post_id = #{postId}
